title: String quartet
creator_credit: Robert Parker, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The Carl Pini String Quartet is seen and heard against a variety of scenic backgrounds performing the Debussy Quartet in G Minor. Also includes scenes of the Quartet at rehearsal and recording and interviews with members.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Parker, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
description: The Carl Pini String Quartet is seen and heard against a variety of scenic backgrounds performing the Debussy Quartet in G Minor. Also includes scenes of the Quartet at rehearsal and recording and interviews with members.
